short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: redditlite is a more efficient way to browse reddit

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Redditlite help you with fast browsing on reddit.com.
1. Hide description of a post in your feeds. You can hover on the item to see the hidden info.
2. Block ads items in your feeds.
